children.subject:
Haven't been in this position but my advice would be:

now to summer: try getting a solid internship if you don't already have on (if you do ignore this step)

summer: focus on doing well so you hopefully get a return offer
fall: focus on full time recruiting, hopefully with return offer already in your pocket

history.content: New grad recruiting occurs at the same time as internship recruiting. Most offers at FAANG/unicorns/quant are signed by November. Graduating in December vs not graduating early shouldn't affect your new grad recruiting timeline.

I'm junior major in CS, and will be graduating in fall 2022, a semester earlier than usual. I'm wondering when to apply for full-time software engineering positions since I'm graduating in Fall 2022 compared to most students who graduate in the spring semester.

I already have got an internship at FAANG company this summer. My conflict is that if I apply the full-time before May, then I don't have this internship experience to talk about, but if I apply after Aug (when my internship ends),  then I felt like it's too late since I'm graduating in Dec.
history.subject: When to apply for swe full-time positions?
